about.title: About Nhat Studio
content: Hello! I'm Nhat, a professional photographer with over 10 years of experience specializing in portrait and ID photography.

My passion for photography began when I was a teenager, and I've been continuously honing my skills since then. I founded Nhat Studio with the mission to provide high-quality photography services at affordable prices.
I believe everyone deserves beautiful photos that show their best selves. Whether you need a simple ID photo or a professional portrait, I am committed to delivering excellent results.
I look forward to welcoming you to our studio and helping you create beautiful memories!

testimonials.title: Customer Reviews
testimonials.subtitle: See what our customers say about their experience with us

items.name: Michael Nguyen
items.testimonial: The team at Nhat Studio did an excellent job with my LinkedIn profile photo. Very professional and the results exceeded my expectations!

items.name: Linda Tran
items.testimonial: I needed urgent passport photos for my visa application. Photos were completed in minutes and perfectly met all requirements. Excellent service!

items.name: Harry Pham
items.testimonial: We had our family photos taken here and they turned out beautifully. The photographer was very patient with our children and captured wonderful moments.

hero.title: Professional Profile Photography
hero.subtitle: Make a lasting impression with high-quality professional profile photos

intro.title: Professional Profile Photo Service
intro.description: Nhat Studio provides professional profile photography services to help you make the best impression in your business and corporate environment. We understand that a professional profile photo can bring many opportunities for your career.

outfit.title: Outfit
tips: Choose formal business attire appropriate for your industry
Prefer neutral colors, avoid overly bright patterns
Men should wear shirts and suits; women can wear shirts or blazers

expression.title: Expression
tips: Natural, friendly smile but not too wide
Keep confident eye contact with the camera
Maintain good posture, relaxed shoulders, show confidence

cta.title: Book Your Professional Profile Photo Session Today
cta.description: Let's Nhat Studio help you create a professional impression with high-quality profile photos. Book now for the best service!

hero.title: Graduation photography
hero.subtitle: Capture the important moments in your life with high-quality photos

intro.title: Graduation photo service
intro.description: Nhat Studio provides professional graduation photography services to help you capture memorable moments on your graduation day. We understand that a beautiful graduation photo can bring you many precious memories.

services.title: Graduation Photography Services
services.description: We offer a variety of graduation photography services to meet your needs, from individual portraits to family photos and event photography.

items.title: Individual Photo Shoot
items.description: Capture your graduation moments with stunning portrait photos.

items.title: Family Photo Shoot
items.description: Capture precious moments with your family on graduation day.

items.title: Event Photography
items.description: Document your entire graduation event from start to finish.

photo_restoration.title: Photo Restoration
photo_restoration.description: Restore your precious memories with modern photo restoration technology

items.title: Basic Restoration
items.description: Repair cracks, scratches, clean stains and balance colors

items.title: Advanced Restoration
items.description: Recreate missing parts, restore details and improve sharpness

items.title: Black & White Colorization
items.description: Add natural colors to black and white photos based on historical research

items.title: Severe Damage Restoration
items.description: Restore torn, burned, yellowed or severely damaged photos

steps.title: 1. Reception and Assessment
steps.description: We receive your old photos, assess damage levels and plan appropriate restoration.

steps.title: 2. High Quality Scanning
steps.description: Your photos are scanned at high resolution to ensure all possible details are preserved.

steps.title: 3. Digital Restoration
steps.description: Our experts use modern technology to repair cracks, stains, and restore colors.

steps.title: 4. Review and Adjustment
steps.description: Results are thoroughly checked and adjusted to ensure the best quality.

steps.title: 5. Product Delivery
steps.description: You receive the restored photos in digital format and high-quality prints (if requested).
